comments:
write this:

  Vector3f[][][]  normals = new Vector3f[][][2];

as soon as the semi-colon is written, a dialog appears saying something bad. 
when the dialog is closed, it reappears.  Eclipse could only be closed by asking
the OS to close it and then electing NOT TO SAVE the buffer containing the
error.  the following was found in the log:
